nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transactions

Interface TicketServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service, TicketService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TicketServiceImpl

    public interface TicketServiceLocal
extends TicketService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.
